summary: This mod will give you a new texture for the Hunting Bow. With this texture the hunting bow will have a kind of red wood look with black leather.
descriptionHtml:
====================================
Hunting Bow Re textured
====================================
Author: Andrej12

Version: 1

8th January 2012

1. Introduction
2. Installation

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============
This mod will give you a new texture for the Hunting Bow. With this texture the hunting bow will have a kind of red wood look with black leather.
Hope you like it.
You can use this texture where you want and how you want just ask me first.
==================
2. Installation
==================
Copy the textures map to you Skyrim data folder.
author: Andrej12
